thread.title: Watch Migos Recreate “Bad and Boujee” With Office Supplies
thread.title_full: Watch Migos Recreate “Bad and Boujee” With Office Supplies

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Watch Migos Recreate “Bad and Boujee” With Office Supplies
text:
Think you need a bangin’ beat from the likes of Metro Boomin for the hip-hop performance of a lifetime? Think again. All you need is objects from your 9 to 5 office grind, some sense of rhythm, and a crew to help you out. Migos appeared on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon this week, and with support from the show’s house band The Roots and Jimmy himself, they recreated their hit song “Bad & Boujee” strictly using office supplies.
MAMA WE GOTTA JOB IN THA OFFICE WITH @jimmyfallon 
https://t.co/rRh0NR0FJu 
— MIGOS™ (@Migos) March 24, 2017 

We’re ready for the weekend, so maybe we’ll stop delivering the music goods and start gathering our office supplies to record a banger of our own. If you also want to assemble a crew to try this out, check out the full instrument list.
Jimmy – iPhone Tones
Questlove – Scissors, Electric Stapler
Black Thought – Thumbtack Shaker
James Poyser – Coffee Pots
Mark Kelley – Keyboard Washboard
Captain Kirk – Tissue Box Guitar with Rubber Band Strings
Frank Knuckles – Water Cooler Jug Bongo
Kamal Gray – Paper Rips
Tuba Gooding Jr. – Bottled Water Jugs
Offset – Paper Clip Shaker
Quavo – Scissor Snips, Coffee Pours
Takeoff – Scotch Tape
Revisit the OG “Bad and Boujee” ft. Lil Uzi Vert below.

In other music news, Kendrick Lamar just dropped a new track – “The Heart Part 4,” get the scoop and listen to it right here .
